Reviews.Title: “Outstanding value”

Reviews.Content: staff helpful professional ensuite twin sole 8 nights comfortable warm armchairs table writing desk chair fashioned crt tv limited channels fridge complimentary bottle water provided day buffet breakfast 5 star standard choice cereals fruit fruit drinks cooked meats cheese rolls boiled scrambled eggs bacon coffee teas missed evening meal paid british visa card meal served professionally suggestions hotel electric kettle sachets coffee tea bags biscuits connect box crt tv channels reception replace tvs flat screen digital tvs disadvantage hotel centre usually walked 12 hour caught public transport tram sbahn

Reviews.Title: “Very noisy, far from attractions, but not bad.”
Reviews.Author: FrequentFlyer055
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights huge clean unfortunately extremely loud hotel ac tried leave window little traffic loud facing busy street breakfast shower staff soso motivated help prompted touristy berlin busses probably stay fine mainly noise location noticed reviewer praised sauna pool hotel actually neither

Reviews.Title: “Excellent large room!”
Reviews.Author: bobinthebottle
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel checked quickly massive 1 bedroom paid wasnt pay 5 euro parking night bad locked underground carpark wireless internet 8 euro 24 hours wasnt night night dont happens restaurant bit slow getting drinks food english speaking tv channels dvd movie watch wanna relax day berlin little noisy sometimes door wasnt woken noise warm night hotels fault pretty hotel
